channel.title: Do you belive in the paranormal?
channel.description: Recently my new favorite show has been ghosthunters/ TAPS. So i was just curious weather or not people belive in that stuff.

item.title: Do you belive in the paranormal?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:21, topic:159830”]I like mystery hunters, and some show i think was called paranormal, about 2 brothers (fake series BTW, its a televison show, not reality) that hunt paranormal shit and kill them.

I love paranormal, it can scare me, make me laugh and gets me thinking outside of the box.[/quote]

The show you are thinking of is called ‘Supernatural’, and it is an awesome show.

@topic, yes I believe there are ghosts and such that science can’t explain.

Read full topic

item.source: Do you belive in the paranormal?

item.title: Do you belive in the paranormal?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

dragonfire455:

there is a house in New York that has been legally classified as haunted

Heh, as far as I know, that’s not quite what it is.

This is just off my memory, but basically someone bought a house not knowing it was “haunted” and took the seller to court. The courts ruled that you must say if it has a history of being haunted. But the house was never declared “legally haunted” or such. I think anyways…

As for me, I do not believe any paranormal stuff.

Read full topic

I love paranormal, it can scare me, make me laugh and gets me thinking outside of the box.

item.title: Do you belive in the paranormal?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Yes, i have seen a few things in my house and my friends house that i believe might have been a ghost… I dont think ghosts are exactly like semi see through characters… I think of them as a spirit that is invisble to a person but can still do things… if you understand that

Read full topic
item.source: Do you belive in the paranormal?

item.title: Do you belive in the paranormal?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:16, topic:159830”]I watch Most Haunted, find it really interesting.
Although you can hardly see much as when something happens the camera shakes violently.[/quote]

I liked that show, and it gave me even more reason to believe in spirits, although once, during a live show, they fucked up. The camera was changed to view whatever back in the studeo, but someone must’ve forgotten to mute the sound coming from wherever the team were, and they were talking about what they were gonna pretend next.

I do not believe that spirits roam Earth, however, I do believe that some people have special talents that allow them to commune with the spirits, people who have died.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you belive in the paranormal?
